verses.1: Tua ciangin Jesu le a nungzuite Galilee Tuili gal khat, Gadara miteʼ gam sung a tung uh hi.
verses.2: Gunkuang tung panin Jesu a kum suk khit phetin, han lak panin a hong pai mi khat in na dawntuah hi.
verses.3: Hih mipa dawivei hi a, han lakah a teeng hi. Kuamah in hih mipa, sikkhau tawh hen zo nawn lo uh hi.
verses.4: Tam veipi tak, a khut le a khe, sikkhau tawh kihen khin ngei a, ahi zongin a kihen simin a sikkhaute botsatin, a khe-a kibulh kolte a sukham gawp hi. Amah hat lua ahih manin kuamah in hih zo lo hi.
verses.5: Sun le zanin han lak le mual tung tengah vak kawikawi a, awng gawpin, suang hiamte tawh amah a kikui liam hi.
verses.6: Hih mipa in Jesu a gal muh ciangin hong delhin ama mai ah khukdin a,
verses.7: nakpi takin kiko-in, “A Lianpen Pasianʼ Tapa Jesu aw, kei bang hong nuammawh na hi hiam? Kei, gim hong pia kei in, ci-in Pasianʼ min tawh kong thum hi,” a ci hi.
verses.8: (Hih bangin a cihna pen, Jesu in, “Dawi aw, hih mipa sung panin paikhia in,” a cihna hang ahi hi.)
verses.9: Jesu in, “Na min bang ahi hiam?” ci-in a dong hi. Mipa in, “Kote tampi pha ka hih manun ka min pen A Honpi ahi hi,” ci-in a dawng hi.
verses.10: Tua gam panin mun dangah dawite a hawlkhiat loh nadingin tua mipa in a thum lailai hi.
verses.11: Tua laitakin tua nai-a om mualpang ah vok hon tampi gamta-in a om hi.
verses.12: Dawite in, “Hua vokte kiang beek ah hong paisak inla, a sungah hong tumsak in,” ci-in a thum uh hi.
verses.13: Tua ahih manin Jesu in dawite a pai nading uh thu pia a, dawite zong mipa sung panin pai khia-in vokte sungah a lut uh hi. Tua vok honpite a vekpi-in tul nih bang pha hi. Mual tung panin tai suk henhan uh a, tuili sung kidenna-in tui kia mang khin uh hi.
verses.14: Tua ciangin tua vokcingte tai-in khua sung le gam sung tengah hih thupiang a gen uh hi. Tua thupiangte a en dingin mite zong hong pai uh hi.
verses.15: Jesu kiang a tun uh ciangin dawi tampi a vei ngei mipa zong a mu uh hi. Tua mipa hoihtakin om a, a lungsim pilin, puan silhin a om a muh uh ciangin lamdang sa-in lau mahmah uh hi.
verses.16: Hih thupiang a mu mi khempeuh in dawivei pa tunga thupiang le vokte thu, mi khempeuh kiangah a gen kawikawi uh hi.
verses.17: Tua ahih ciangin amau gam panin a paikhiat nadingin mipite in Jesu a sawl khia uh hi.
verses.18: Tua lai panin gunkuang tungah Jesu a kah tohkik ciangin dawi a vei ngei mipa in, “Kei zong hong zuisak in,” ci-in a thum hi.
verses.19: Ahi zongin Jesu in amah zuisak lo a, “Na innkuanpihte kiangah ciahkik inla, Topa in nang a hong hehpihna le nangma tunga a hong bawlnate va gen in,” ci-in a sawl zaw hi.
verses.20: Tua ahih ciangin a mipa ciah a, tua kiim a om Khuapi Sawmte sungah, Jesu in ama adingin a sepnate gen a, tua thu a za mi khempeuh in lamdang a sa uh hi.
verses.21: Jesu, gunkuang tuangin a gal kah khit ciangin, tuili gei ama kiangah mi tampi tak hong kikhawm leuleu uh hi.
verses.22: Tua laitakin kikhopna inn a uk, Jairas a kici mi khat hong pai a, Jesu a muh ciangin a khe phung ah bokin,
verses.23: “Ka tanu si dektak ta hi. Amah a cidam kikin a nuntak theih nadingin hong pai inla, ama tungah na khut hong ngaksak in,” ci-in a thum hi.
verses.24: Jesu zong, tua mipa tawh a paikhia khawm hi. Mi tampi tak in zong zui uh ahih manin Jesu a nehcip uh hi.
verses.25: Tuate lakah, kum sawm le kum nih sung tawntung siluang natna a nei numei khat a om hi.
verses.26: Siavuan tampi in amah bawl a, a sum neih khempeuh zang khin napi-in noptuam zaw loin gim semsem zaw hi.
verses.27: Tua numei in Jesuʼ thu za ahih manin mihonte kawmah Jesuʼ nung a zui hi.
verses.28: Tua nu in, “A puan mong nangawn va lawng kha leng, dam ning,” ci-in a ngaihsun hi.
verses.29: A va lawn khit phetin a siluang khawl pah a, ama sunga a natna a damlam a kiphawk hi.
verses.30: Jesu in ama sung panin a vangliatna a paikhiat lam phawk pah ahih manin mihonpite lakah khuadakin, “Kua in ka puan hong lawng na hi uh hiam?” a ci hi.
verses.31: A nungzuite in, “Mihonpite in nang hong nehcih lam na thei hi. Bang hangin kua in hong lawng na hi uh hiam, ci mawk na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.32: Ahi zongin amah a lawngte a theih nadingin Jesu khuadak kawikawi lai hi.
verses.33: Tua numei in ama tunga thupiang thei ahih manin laukawm liingkawmin hong pai-in a khe phung ah hong bok a, a thupiang khempeuh ahi bangbangin a hong gen hi.
verses.34: Jesu in zong tua nu kiangah, “Ka tanu aw, na upna in nang hong damsak zo hi. Cidam suak inla, lungnuam takin va ciah in,” a ci hi.
verses.35: Tua laitakin kikhopna inn ukpaʼ inn panin kamtaite hong tung uh a, “Na tanu si khinta hi. Bang hangin Siapa mawk gimsak nawn ding na hi hiam?” a ci uh hi.
verses.36: Ahi zongin Jesu in amau thu kigen don loin kikhopna inn ukpa kiangah, “Lunghimawh kei in; upna nei peuh in,” a ci hi.
verses.37: Tua lai panin Jesu in Peter le James le a nau Johan longal kuamah dang kizuisak nawn lo hi.
verses.38: Kikhopna inn ukpaʼ inn a tun uh ciangin miteʼ kahna le thumna, a gamlumna uh a mu hi.
verses.39: Amah sung tumin, “Bang hangin hici gamlum na hi uh hiam? Bang hangin kap na hi uh hiam? Numeino a si hi lo hi; a ihmu hi bek hi,” a ci hi.
verses.40: Amaute in Jesu zahpih bawlin nuihsan uh ahih manin Jesu in amaute khempeuh pusuaksak a, numeinoʼ pa le a nu le a nungzui thumte tawh, numeinoʼ lupna inn dei ah a pai uh hi.
verses.41: Tua ciangin numeinoʼ khut lenin, “Numeino aw, tho in,” a cihna, “ Talitha kumi,” a ci hi.
verses.42: Numeino zong thakhatin tho-in lam a pai pah hi. (Amah kum sawm le kum nih pha ta hi.) Tua ciangin amaute in lamdang sa mahmah uh hi.
verses.43: Hih thu, kuama kiangah a gen loh nadingun Jesu in nakpi takin amaute kham a, tua ciangin, “Numeino an pia un,” ci-in a sawl hi.
